review: Doctor is very helpful though consulted via video call..but the medicine is effective.. thanks for your kindness...

review: I have been suffering from  stomach infection which leads to dehydration and weakness then in practo i Have found Dr. Poddar who diagnosed my problem and prescribed me some medicine which helped me to recover fast.and I am very thankful for that.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy with my experience. I was listened to very patiently, guided at all times and given proper advice and medicines. Dr. Poddar infact himself followed up with me regarding my progress multiple times. Such dedication is rare. I personally have not seen it elsewhere. Thank you Doctor.

It was a really good experience with Dr. Saugata Poddar. I was suffering from high fever and bad headache. His diagnosis helped to find the root cause as well as the medicine bring down the fever and headache within 1 day. He is very supportive, strongly recommend him for any kind of consultation.

This doctor is totally ******** *** unfriendly to patients. I consulted him in practo for dry cough issues and he asked to share details (age, weight etc.) and said he will issue the prescription after sharing details and it will take time. I politely asked him how much it might take as I had to go out for getting medicines and it‚Äôs night time. To which he said ‚Äúwhat you were doing throughout the day and in the night you thought of consulting a doctor‚Äù. I got time to consult a doctor in the night as I was working during the day time. I told him the same and requested that it will be great if I get to know a tentative time as I have a toddler at my home and I will be obliged if I get to know a time. ** *** ********* ******** *** **** * **** * ** **** ******** ****** *** ** **** * ********* ***** ** ******* ******** ********** 

His behaviour is not right and I will not recommend anyone else to him.

It was a really great experience to consult Mr. Poddar sir. I am having back pain on the right side. He had suggested me medicines and some other suggestions on whatsapp chat. i got answers of all my queries. He is really a friendly doctor. Moreover, the conversation was free of cost.

His understanding is clear, Inform patient about treatment and guides till end. I like the attitude and nature which are really missing now a days. I am very much happy. He listens everything what i said and suggests me accordingly that helped me a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was a quick consultation, Doctor listened the issue carefully and prescribed proper medication, also suggested good medical advice for the health benefits. I booked online consultation for my ongoing cough, cold, fever and acute chest congestion. It was a friendly consultation with him like a family doctor. He suggested medicines and post one dosage of his medication I started feeling quite better. Doctor is having excellent clinical skills. He gives enough time to understand the health issues. Strongly recommend!

The consultation was satisfactory 
The prescribed medicines worked well
The doctor was on time and accepted the video call request as well so that I can describe myself better
